name: Molimo
description:
Description : 

Molimo was a game made in 3 weeks with a team of 10 !

This project concludes our school year (L2) !

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer and Lead of the project

- Pecquet Iris, Game Programmer

- Lannuzel Alicia, Game Artist 

- Antonio Manuel, Game Artist & Lead Artist

- Henneron Matéo, Game Artist

- Zalisz Valentin, Game Artist

- Gontier Luc, Game Designer

- Derisquebourg Gaspard, Game Designer

- Bastard Gabin, Game Designer & Lead Designer

- Hodé Sacha, Game Designer

Thanks to our teachers Esteves Aurélien and Reynaert Vincent to help us during the project !

How to Play :

You just need to use your mouse (or your finger if you are on phone) to move the plates from the bottom of your screen to the player to move it and reach the exit!

The game doesn't have backup so when you leave, you lose your progression
